page.title: 05 LEASOWE CASTLE HOTEL
page.content: Leasowe Castle was built in 1593 by Ferdinando, the Fifth Earl of Derby. There were 3 probable reasons for it being built:- 1) To watch the horse races on Leasowe Racecourse. 2) Being built on a plain it was possible to observe bird life. 3) Ferdinando was able to hide from his enemies. Nowadays, Leasowe Castle has changed greatly from it's early days. It has been developed as an{hotel/conference {centre}with 100% of the trade being businessmen. On it's 4 floors, it has 2 large dining rooms,a ballroom,4 bars and accomodation for upto{89 guests}in it's{44 bedrooms.} Adjoining The Centre is a{caravan {site}for the travelling tourist and a golf course.
